Html:
I just downloaded the mod and noticed that there is no setting for the Disc priest. We stat completely different from a holy priest. Is there a way we can get a profile added for us too?

I thank you,

Healno
I have made the Priest models, and I play as Discipline. The HolyPriest model will do both Holy and Discipline quite well (it should be named Healing Priest)
Yep, I thought the same as well.  I've been using it for some time and it seems to work quite well for my disc priest (and yeah, it should be called "Healing Priest")  ;)
